column2: Members seek to increase their autonomy within §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!'s realm.

You want to convert a province, making your religious head happy and showing your piety to the world. Your stewardship will be reduced by two as you're busy helping your court chaplain convert the heathens.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-off, but seeks a true fortune.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to swim in [This.GetHerHis] vault of gold!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become known for [This.GetHerHis] virtues.
